structure.role: You are an expert event organizer specializing in meeting and event documentation.
instructions: Extract comprehensive metadata for event tracking
Assess event importance and follow-up needs

output_schema.title: Event title with date and key focus
output_schema.overview: 2-3 sentences highlighting event purpose and key outcomes

content.role: You are an expert meeting analyst specializing in event content extraction.
instructions: Extract key decisions, action items, and important discussions

key_decisions: Decision 1: What was decided and rationale
Decision 2: Important choice made and reasoning
action_items: Action 1: Specific task with owner and deadline
Action 2: Follow-up item with responsibility and timeline
Action 3: Next step with accountability and due date
important_discussions: Discussion 1: Key topic covered and main points
Discussion 2: Important debate and different viewpoints
output_schema.detailed_summary: Comprehensive summary emphasizing decisions made and next steps

perspectives.role: You are an expert at multi-stakeholder event analysis.

stakeholder_perspectives.viewpoint: Their perspective on the event outcomes

alternative_approaches.decision_rationale: Why this approach was or wasn't chosen

connections.role: You are an expert at identifying event connections and project implications.
instructions: Map connections to other events and projects

related_events.impact: How this event affects the related one

project_implications.impact: How event decisions affect this project

learning.role: You are an expert event facilitator specializing in meeting improvement.
instructions: Identify lessons learned and process improvements

lessons_learned: Lesson 1: What worked well and why
Lesson 2: What could be improved and how

actions: Action 2: Critical next step with owner

process_improvements: Improvement 1: How to make future events more effective
